metadata.title: CVE-2022-37452 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Exim before 4.95 has a heap-based buffer overflow for the alias list inhost_name_lookup in host.c when sender_host_name is set.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-37452` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

exim4 - 4.93-13ubuntu1.6
exim4-base - 4.93-13ubuntu1.6
exim4-config - 4.93-13ubuntu1.6
exim4-daemon-heavy - 4.93-13ubuntu1.6
exim4-daemon-light - 4.93-13ubuntu1.6
eximon4 - 4.93-13ubuntu1.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: exim4 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.93-13ubuntu1.6').
